gpt_comment: Well, my friend, Meteoblue seems to be feeling a bit Fahrenheit-y, marking a high of 75°F (approx 24°C) and a low of 65°F (approx 18°C). It doesn't stray too far from our original sunny forecast of 23.1°C average in Brussels, with no rain in sight. Given that YR.no and KNMI couldn't chip in, I'd say we're pretty confident in our original forecast. So, go out and enjoy that sunshine, Brussels!
